condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, Government and civil society organizations have increased capacity to analyze and monitor situation of children, youth and women and develop programmes to address bottlenecks and barriers identified

description.narrative: Government and civil society organizations' capacity to monitor the situation of youth to inform decision making has been increased through comprehensive situation analysis of young people, youth consultations with local authorities in pilot regions and scale up of U-Report, a digital youth engagement platform. Capacity and inter-sectoral coordination of key stakeholders at national and sub-national levels is enhanced in monitoring, implementation and reporting of the situation of vulnerable families and children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
